history.content: Also Music 158 has been replaced by Music 158A, which I think still counts as an elective.
We need to update the guide. ling 100, poli sci 135/w135, and music 158A.

Ling 100 is no longer listed as a technical elective on this link on updated EECS website: http://guide.berkeley.edu/undergraduate/degree-programs/computer-science/#majorrequirementstext.

I entered Berkeley in Fall 2014, and I want to confirm whether Ling 100 is indeed still a technical elective because I used my Phase I units to enroll in it.

Additionally, Poli Sci 135 (Game Theory) is no longer listed either. I'm currently taking this class in summer session because it was listed as a technical elective, and I would like to confirm whether it still is.

EDIT: The classes mentioned above WERE included on the technical elective list during Spring 2016, when we enrolled in Phase I and summer classes. Therefore, students who are enrolled in classes that were formerly listed as technical electives like myself are concerned and would appreciate an answer as soon as possible.
history.subject: Is Ling 100 still a technical elective?
